title: Enterprise Server Application is needed
body: Windows Phone 7 is inclined more towards individual user experience. Even as a developer we can create most of the apps for individual users that is standalone. If we need to target corporates then then we would need more APIs for device management, also like Zune (for a single user), we would need an Enterprise Server Application which can control the devices (of employees) remotely where we can apply corporate policies on the device as well.

comments.body: This is the biggest reason winphone isn't selling to corporate. Our company IT is refusing me access to corporate email etc. because my Lumia doesn't allow remote config. Priority 1!!!
